description: This is a BitBake recipe file (with .inc extension) used in the Yocto Project for building and configuring the GTK+ 3 library. It specifies dependencies, configuration options, build steps, installation procedures, and package details to integrate GTK+ 3 into a Linux build environment.

methods.name: prepare_gtk_scripts
methods.description: Prepares GTK icon cache update scripts by renaming and creating necessary symlinks.

methods.name: do_install:append:class-target
methods.description: Appends GTK script preparations to the target installation process.

methods.name: do_install:append:class-nativesdk
methods.description: Appends GTK script preparations for the native SDK installation.

methods.name: do_install:append:class-native
methods.description: Creates wrappers for GTK icon cache update and svg encoding commands during native installation.
